publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.l: I'm a leaf upon at tree among many different ones
As my life go and I grow I have learned to love the sun
I'm a leaf upon a tree that is soaking up the sun
On a branch upon the willow tree
All the leaves are warming up in glee
In the winter they will cease to be
We are leaves upon a tree we are many different kinds
As our lives go we grow and we're grateful for the sun
We are leaves upon a tree in the winter we will be gone
Catching the wind that will lay us
